ygData.subject: Writer Pool Process
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, I am trying to write an writer processor will will write the crawled data into SOLR/Lucene, I needed to know the steps to create a pool of such writer

Hi All,

I am trying to write an writer processor will will write the crawled 
data into SOLR/Lucene, I needed to know the steps to create a pool of 
such writer processor as in case of ARCWriterProcessorPool.

Can you anyone guide me on this.

--Thanks and Regards
Vaijanath
